transformations.name: DrvHash
transformations.description:
Creating/updating the columns 'HashedColumns'

sha2(256,columns()) could be used

typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	columns as string ('ProductNumber,ProductName,Color,StandardCost,ListPrice,Size'),
	BusinessKey as string ('ProductNumber')
}
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> SrcGeneric
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> DimGeneric
SrcGeneric derive(HashedColumns = sha2(256,byNames(split($columns,',')))) ~> DrvHash
DrvHash, DimGeneric lookup(HashedColumns == byName('Hash'),
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LKPExists
LKPExists split(isMatch(),
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplit1@(Existing rows, New or updated rows)
ConditionalSplit1@New or updated rows alterRow(upsertIf(true())) ~> AlterRowUpsert
AlterRowUpsert sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sinkDimGeneric
